# EditMicroflowExpressionResult.IsCanceled property

Whether the editor form was canceled by the user.

```csharp
public bool IsCanceled { get; }
```

## Remarks

If the form was canceled, the [`Expression`](./Expression.md) property will always be

```csharp
null
```

.
